full_threads.body: Ignore me I updated it

Hi Jules, 

Yes, it may take a few moments but it will refresh automatically.

Thanks Chris!

I have found a mistake in the form./ if I update it in snapforms will it automatically update?

Hi Jules,

Thanks.

With the page published, we have now added the page to the main navigation. 

Please review and let us know if there are any further changes.

Hi Chris,

We are ready to go live on the scholarship page.

I have published and activated the snap form. Cleared cache.

Its to sit under Tenancies/ Your programs but I can not see it there.

Can you make this happen today?

Jules

Hi Julienne,

Your are most welcome. I also noticed I provided you with an incomplete link, sorry. Here is the full link: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/?page_id=2251&preview=true

The good news is your website is hosted, maintained and supported by us on a Care Plan. This is a standard part of every website build. You can check out the Care Plans here: https://wolfiq.com.au/care-plans/

Your website is on a Pro Plan, which means you also receive up to 2 hours of developer support. This is perfect for tasks such as the one complete. Updating pages, changing images, content etc.

Any questions, please be sure to let me know.
+15 mins additional to harvest/

Hi Julienne, 

Apologies for the delay. 

Confirming the image has been updated, please review the draft page here: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/?page_id=2251&preview=tru

Hi @chris done updating image

link: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/?page_id=2251&preview=true

Screenshot


Time: +10mins @rica
Hi @jaime can you please action this as a priority?

Hi Chris,

Sorry to harass you. Any chance you can update the image tomorrow morning for me to do final review? We would like to go live tomorrow.

Many thanks,
+15mns to harvest

Hi Chris,

Page looks great. I have made a few text edits in breakdance. Can you please replace the image with this one:

Young Pretty Female Student Holding Books Stock Photo 1770573596 | Shutterstock

Then one more final review tomorrow and then I will advise when it can go live.

Many Thanks,

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Julienne, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now created a Draft page and ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/?page_id=2251&preview=true

Please let us know if that's good to go so we can push it to live.
+15mins to Harvest

Hi @rica done with the image updates
https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/?page_id=2251&preview=true



Time: +10mins
@jaime need your help with this.

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Rika,

Julienne at Women’s Housing Company needs assistance with some updates.

1. Adding image to the following page: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/?page_id=2251&preview=true

Image: https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/young-asian-student-girl-holding-books-2037550166

An example of image treatment and positioning can be seen here: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/about-us/vision-and-values/
Screenshot shows additional position page updates.

2. Leave in draft mode for approval by Julienne

3. Once approved, make it live and add it to the main navigation as shown in screenshot #2.

Thanks!

￼￼

Lets go with this one.

Young Asian Student Girl Holding Books Stock Photo 2037550166 | Shutterstock <https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/young-asian-student-girl-holding-books-2037550166>



1. Image - We can make space for an image. We would borrow design elements from this page:https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/about-us/vision-and-values/ Great, this looks good.

Please note, that the images you have shortlisted do not appear to match the styling used throughout the site. Here is an example of the current look and feel: https://www.womenshousingcompany.org.au/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/womens-housing-company-home-3.webp OK, I will find a similar image of a girl with books, with no background.

2. Page location - Yes, we can position the page to sit under Tenancies/ your programs – Excellent, thank you

3. The form appears to already be on the page. Is there something missing from the page/form that needs to be added? I need to edit the form with some minor changes today. I don’t see that it’s been added from my end. Is it what “Code Block” means when looking in breakdance? Do I just let you know when all is approved and you make it live? Or once I approve it in Snap Forms it automatically goes live?


Thanks,

Chris Paradowski
support@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:support@wolfiq.com.au>

<https://wolfiq.com.au/>
Are you impressed with our service? Click here <https://app.wolfiq.com.au/wolf-iq-163218006132999/review-us?dashboard=1&bpref=footerbanner>to review us on Google!

Christmas closure: Please note, we will be running a skeleton crew from 22 Dec to 8 Jan 2024. All non-urgent requests will be actioned on our return. Wishing you the best for 2024 and thank you for your continued support this year!

Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:

Lite Care Plans - 15mins/month
Pro Care Plans - 2hrs/month
Expert Care Plan - 5hrs/month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $109/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request.

Hi Julienne,

Thanks for the prompt reply. Unfortunately, your response doesn't appear to have come through. Can you please resend it?
